        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage readImageFromFile​(java.lang.String aFilePathname)
                                                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns image with specified pathname. NOTE: ImageIO class is NOT thread safe! (thus synchronized)
        Parameters:
        aFilePathname - The pathname of the image file
        Returns:
        Image with specified pathname or null if image is not available
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

                                       java.lang.String aFilename,

                                       ImageFileType anImageFileType)
        Writes an image to file. NOTE: ImageIO class is NOT thread safe! (thus synchronized)
        Parameters:
        aDestinationDirectory - Destination directory
        aFilename - File name (without directory information)
        anImage - Image
        anImageFileType - Image file type
        Returns:
        True: Operation was successful, false: Otherwise

      • writeSortableIndexedImageToFile

        public static boolean writeSortableIndexedImageToFile​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage anImage,
                                                      ImageFileType anImageFileType,
                                                      java.lang.String aDestinationDirectory,
                                                      int anIndex,
                                                      int aMaximumIndex)
        Writes a sortable indexed image to file, i.e. anIndex = 3 and aMaximumIndex = 100 the pathname is Path/Image003.ending NOTE: ImageIO is NOT thread safe! (thus synchronized)
        Parameters:
        anImage - Image
        anImageFileType - Image file type
        aDestinationDirectory - Full path of destination directory
        anIndex - Index for image
        aMaximumIndex - Maximum index for images
        Returns:
        True: Operation was successful, false: Otherwise

      • convertBufferedImageToJpegEncodedByteArray

        public static byte[] convertBufferedImageToJpegEncodedByteArray​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage aBufferedImage)
        Compresses buffered image to JPEG encoded byte array. NOTE: This method MUST be static synchronized otherwise images may be corrupt.
        Parameters:
        aBufferedImage - Buffered image
        Returns:
        Byte array that JPEG encodes a buffered image or null if byte array could not be created

      • convertJpegEncodedByteArrayToBufferedImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage convertJpegEncodedByteArrayToBufferedImage​(byte[] aJpegEncodedByteArray)
        Decompresses JPEG encoded byte array (from method convertBufferedImageToJpegEncodedByteArray()) to buffered image. NOTE: This method MUST be static synchronized otherwise images may be corrupt.
        Parameters:
        aJpegEncodedByteArray - JPEG encoded byte array (from method convertBufferedImageToJpegEncodedByteArray())
        Returns:
        Buffered image or null if buffered image could not be created
